meanings.definition: The amount that a book can hold; a full book.
meanings.sent1: I carried a bookfuls of books to the library.
meanings.sent2: Her bookshelf was filled with bookfuls of novels.
meanings.sent3: The bookfuls on the shelf looked like a colorful tower.
meanings.sent4: His love for reading was evident in the bookfuls he owned.
meanings.sent5: The bookfuls in the bookstore tempted me to buy more.

meanings.sent1: The library had bookfuls of books on various topics.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours browsing through bookfuls of mysteries.
meanings.sent3: Carrying bookfuls of books home made her arms ache.
meanings.sent4: The bookfuls in the bookstore seemed to call out to her.
meanings.sent5: The bookfuls in the attic created a cozy reading nook.
